answerText: liquid crystals[10] Liquid crystals can exist in various mesophases, including this one, in which molecules are aligned with one another but not arranged in a regular order. LCD screens use this form of liquid crystal.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 2 | 8 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Friedrich Reinitzer observed the first of these materials to be discovered, cholesteryl benzoate, in 1888. [10] Name this class of materials, which consist of polarizable rod-like molecules that exhibit local alignment but no long-range order. They generally have order parameters between 0.3 and 0.9.
